1. Common Diabetes Medication Slows Brain Aging in Monkeys  ScienceAlert

  3. How a low-cost diabetes drug metformin can slow ageing in male monkeys  The Indian Express
  4. Elderly Monkeys Aged More Slowly When Given a Cheap Diabetes Drug Used by Millions  Singularity Hub
  5. Diabetes drug may dramatically delay effect of ageing on human brain: study  South China Morning Post
